metadata.title: CVE-2024-30172 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Bouncy Castle Java Cryptography APIs before1.78. An Ed25519 verification code infinite loop can occur via a craftedsignature and public key.

criterions.comment: bouncycastle package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
